{{redirect|SoulMate||Soulmate (disambiguation){{!}}Soulmate}} {{Infobox song | name = SoulMate | cover = Justin Timberlake SoulMate cover.png | alt = | type = single | artist = [[Justin Timberlake]] | album = | released = {{start date|2018|07|03}} | format = {{hlist|[[Music download|Digital download]]|[[Streaming media|streaming]]}} | recorded = 2018 | studio = | genre = | length = 3:16 | label = [[RCA Records|RCA]] | writer = {{hlist|Justin Timberlake|[[James Fauntleroy]]|[[Nineteen85|Paul Jefferies]]|[[Jagged Edge (American group)|Brian Casey]]|Gary Smith|Bert Young|[[Jagged Edge (American group)|Brandon Casey]]}} | producer = {{hlist|[[Nineteen85]]|Justin Timberlake}} | chronology = [[Justin Timberlake]] | prev_title = [[Say Something (Justin Timberlake song)|Say Something]] | prev_year = 2018 | next_title = [[Believe (Meek Mill song)|Believe]] | next_year = 2020 }} "'''SoulMate'''" is a song recorded by American singer-songwriter [[Justin Timberlake]].{{Cite web |url=https://pitchfork.com/news/justin-timberlake-shares-new-song-soulmate-listen/ |title=Justin Timberlake Shares New Song “SoulMate”: Listen |website=[[Pitchfork (website)|Pitchfork]] |language=en |access-date=2018-07-04}}{{Cite web |url=https://variety.com/2018/music/news/justin-timberlake-new-song-soulmate-1202864971/ |title=Justin Timberlake Drops Surprise Summer Song, ‘SoulMate’ |last=Bitran |first=Tara |date=2018-07-03 |website=Variety |language=en-US |access-date=2018-07-04}} Described as contender for "song of the summer",{{Cite web |url=http://ew.com/music/2018/07/03/justin-timberlake-soulmate-surprise-song/ |title=Justin Timberlake just dropped a surprise new song |website=[[Entertainment Weekly]] |language=en |access-date=2018-07-04}} it was written and produced by Canadian producer [[Nineteen85]] with an additional writing from [[James Fauntleroy]], Timberlake, [[Jagged Edge (American group)|Brian Casey]], Gary Smith, Bert Young and [[Jagged Edge (American group)|Brandon Casey]].{{Cite web |url=http://www.vulture.com/2018/07/justin-timberlake-releases-new-song-soulmate.html |title=Meanwhile, Justin Timberlake Wants the Song of Summer |last=Lockett |first=Dee |website=Vulture |language=en |access-date=2018-07-04}}{{Cite web |url=https://www.stereogum.com/2004433/justin-timberlake-soulmate/music/ |title=Justin Timberlake - "SoulMate" |date=2018-07-03 |website=[[Stereogum]] |access-date=2018-07-04}} Its release coincided with the summer leg of [[The Man of the Woods Tour]].{{cite web|url=https://celebmix.com/justin-timberlake-a-year-in-review/|work=CelebMix|date=January 6, 2019|accessdate=January 12, 2019|author=Brittany Sims|title=Justin Timberlake: A Year in Review}} ==Credits and personnel== Credits adapted from [[Tidal (service)|Tidal]].{{cite web|url=https://listen.tidal.com/album/91393493|title=SoulMate / Justin Timberlake|publisher=[[Tidal (service)|Tidal]]|accessdate=July 3, 2018}} {{Div col}} *Justin Timberlake – vocals, composer, lyricist, vocal producer *James Fauntleroy – vocals, composer, lyricist *Paul Jefferies – composer, producer, keyboard, drums *Brian Casey – composer, lyricist *Brandon Casey – composer, lyricist *Gary Smith – composer, lyricist *Bert Young – composer, lyricist *Chris Godbey – mixing engineer, recording engineer *Chris Athens – mastering engineer *Dalton "D-10" Tennant – bass *Elliot Ives – guitar {{Div col end}} == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Peak
position |- {{single chart|Flanders Tip|4|artist=Justin Timberlake|song=Soulmate|rowheader=true|accessdate=August 11, 2018}} |- {{single chart|Wallonia Tip|12|artist=Justin Timberlake|song=Soulmate|rowheader=true|accessdate=August 11, 2018}} |- {{single chart|Canada|83|artist=Justin Timberlake|rowheader=true|accessdate=July 18, 2018}} |- {{singlechart|Billboardjapanhot100|51|artist=Justin Timberlake|rowheader=true|accessdate=July 31, 2018}} |- {{single chart|Sweden|42|artist=Justin Timberlake|song=Soulmate|rowheader=true|accessdate=July 13, 2018}} |- {{single chart|Billboardadultcontemporary|29|artist=Justin Timberlake|rowheader=true|accessdate=August 14, 2018}} |- {{single chart|Billboardadultpopsongs|25|artist=Justin Timberlake|rowheader=true|accessdate=July 31, 2018}} |- {{single chart|Billboardpopsongs|34|artist=Justin Timberlake|rowheader=true|accessdate=July 24, 2018}} |} == References == {{reflist|30em}} {{Justin Timberlake songs}} [[Category:2018 songs]] [[Category:2018 singles]] [[Category:Justin Timberlake songs]] [[Category:Songs written by Justin Timberlake]] [[Category:Song recordings produced by Nineteen85]] [[Category:Songs written by James Fauntleroy]] [[Category:Songs written by Nineteen85]]
